title: A Present From the Two
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Ayumu-chan, I heard that you met Chika-chan’s Shiitake-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! She was big, fluffy, and had really gentle eyes, she was really cute~. I got to pet her a lot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, Shiitake-chan is such an obedient and gentle girl, right. Did you get to brush her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! She rolled over to show her tummy, she seemed to have really enjoyed it. Hey, Riko-chan, there’s something I’d like to ask….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>If I were to make a hand-knit doll of Shiitake-chan and give it as a present to Chika-chan, would that cause trouble? Isn’t it kind of bad to make one of Shiitake-chan without permission….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s not true! I’m sure Chika-chan will be happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, that’s good then. Riko-chan, would you like to make it together? Since you’re a neighbor, I was thinking that you would’ve seen Shiitake-chan a lot more than me and would know more of her details, so I’d love it if you can guide me as we make it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Leave it to me! Let’s make it together and give it to her as a present<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! Let’s surprise both Chika-chan and Shiitake-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
